column1: # This file defines how to handle GISAID location fields with more than the expected 4 values
# For help on what values they should be changed to, the following command will summarise
# the original GISAID Location and our curated values
# cat data/seasonal_flu.ndjson | jq -r '[.Location, .region, .country, .division, .location] | join(" :: ")' | sort  | uniq -c
# The first column is the GISAID Location - spaces surrounding the '/' are optional
# a '*' character in the first column matches any value
# The second column is the corrected Location (spaces surrounding the '/' are still optional)
# If the first column had a '*' character then you may use one here to refer back to that field in the original.
# Lines starting with '#' are treated as comments, but '#' should not appear elsewhere in a row
